Package logic.player.ai

Class AIPlayer.AIMoveProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ui.BlockingThread
        • logic.player.ai.AIPlayer.AIMoveProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    AIPlayer
    private class AIPlayer.AIMoveProcessor
extends BlockingThread
    Performs the minmax operation in parallel. Uses one thread for each CPU core.
    Represents a thread for running a blocking operation. Used to allow the UI to continue to update.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  AIPlayer.AIMoveProcessor.AIMoveThread
      A single thread to perform minmax operations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AIMoveProcessor

        public AIMoveProcessor​(Game game)
        Constructor for AIMoveProcessor. Creates a thread for each CPU core and assigns top level min operations for each possible core to each one in turn.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to do the minmax process on.

    • Method Detail

      • bound

        private int bound​(int in)
        Used to keep track of which thread to assign each move to. If the input is outside the range of the threads array, set it to 0.
        Parameters:
        in - The index to bound.
        Returns:
        The bounded index.

      • checkMax

        private void checkMax​(int result,
                      AIPlayer.Move move)
        Checks if the result of a min operation is a new maximum and updates the stored maximum and best move is so.
        Parameters:
        result - The result of the operation.
        move - The move that got that result.

      • getBestMove

        public AIPlayer.Move getBestMove()
        Getter for the best move found.
        Returns:
        The best move.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Stops the threads.

      • operation

        protected void operation()
        The blocking operation to run. In this case starts all threads and then waits for each to finish.
        Specified by:
        operation in class BlockingThread
